title: Why am I not able to study, even when I want to study? What can I do to improve myself? - Quora

response.answer_text: If u r not able to study, there can be some reasons. If you are under stress. So try to keep yourself calm. Do meditation or listen to songs for some time. Keep smiling :)If you get easily distracted. Try to find the factors that distract you. End them. For eg. Mobile or social media.If you dont take adequate sleep and rest. Make sure that u are energetic.If you start thinking something else. Remove all the imaginary things and focusSOME TIPS . Always enjoy what you do, what you study.Refresh yourself after regular intervals. Have a break.Eat your favourite food. Avoid outside food. Only homemade.If you feel tired take a small nap.Think you can do this. Push urself to extreme. Dont compromise your sleep.Be talkative. Share what you studied with your parentsAll these tips have helped me to score above 95%. Hope it helps you. :)

response.answer_text: First identify the reason why you actually want to study. When you really have a strong desire for doing something you do it without making excuses. Secondly , what are the reasons you are not able to study? Is it because of the distractions in your environment? If yes , switch off your phone ,go to the library or close the door of your room while studying and let everyone know that you are studying. Is it because you are tensed about something or your mind wanders whenever you start studying? If yes then do this: Express all the things that are cluttering your mind on a piece of paper. Keep the paper aside and tell yourself that you will get back to those things written on the piece of paper once you get over with studying. Hope This Helps!
